properties.description: Data collection rule for VM Insights.

alertlist.query: InsightsMetrics | where Namespace == "Memory" and Name == "AvailableMB" | extend memorySizeMB = todouble(parse_json(Tags).["vm.azm.ms/memorySizeMB"]) | extend PercentageBytesinUse = Val/memorySizeMB*100    | summarize AvgMemUse = avg(PercentageBytesinUse) by bin(TimeGenerated, 15m), _ResourceId,Computer

InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == 'LogicalDisk'
    and Name == 'FreeSpacePercentage'
    and Origin == "vm.azm.ms"
| extend Disk=tostring(todynamic(Tags)["vm.azm.ms/mountId"])
| where Val < 10 //would use a low value...
| summarize by _ResourceId,Computer, Disk, Val
| where Disk notcontains "snap"

InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == 'LogicalDisk'
    and Name == 'FreeSpacePercentage'
    and Origin == "vm.azm.ms"
| extend Disk=tostring(todynamic(Tags)["vm.azm.ms/mountId"])
| where Val < 5 //would use a low value...
| summarize by _ResourceId,Computer, Disk, Val
| where Disk notcontains "snap"
InsightsMetrics| where Namespace == 'Computer' and Name == 'Heartbeat'| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by _ResourceId, Computer| where TimeGenerated < ago(5m)

InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == 'Processor'
    and Name == 'UtilizationPercentage'
    and Origin == "vm.azm.ms"
| extend Computer=tostring(todynamic(Tags)["vm.azm.ms/computer"])
| where Val > 90 //would use a low value...
| summarize by _ResourceId,Computer, Val

InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == 'Processor'
    and Name == 'UtilizationPercentage'
    and Origin == "vm.azm.ms"
| extend Computer=tostring(todynamic(Tags)["vm.azm.ms/computer"])
| where Val > 95 //would use a low value...
| summarize by _ResourceId,Computer, Val

A tag to apply the association conditionally.
Resource group the alert is placed in
Tags on the Resource group the alert is placed in
Resource Id of the action group to be used for the alert
Required. Specifies the name of the policy definition. Maximum length is 64 characters.
Optional. The display name of the policy definition. Maximum length is 128 characters.
Optional. The policy definition mode. Default is All, Some examples are All, Indexed, Microsoft.KeyVault.Data.
Optional. The policy Definition metadata. Metadata is an open ended object and is typically a collection of key-value pairs.
Optional. The policy definition parameters that can be used in policy definition references.
Required. The Policy Rule details for the Policy Definition.
Optional. The group ID of the Management Group. If not provided, will use the current scope for deployment.
Optional. Enable telemetry via the Customer Usage Attribution ID (GUID).

Optional. The policy definition mode. Default is All, Some examples are All, Indexed, Microsoft.KeyVault.Data.
Optional. The policy Definition metadata. Metadata is an open ended object and is typically a collection of key-value pairs.
Optional. The policy definition parameters that can be used in policy definition references.
Required. The Policy Rule details for the Policy Definition.
Optional. The group ID of the Management Group. If not provided, will use the current scope for deployment.
Optional. Enable telemetry via the Customer Usage Attribution ID (GUID).
